      Classes in org.springframework.data.marklogic.repository.query that implement CombinedQueryDefinition 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CombinedQueryDefinitionBuilder
      Allow us to keep a running build of query/options so we can set them throughout the different processing levels.
